Reviews.Title: “Affordable, far, great view, def. 1 or 2 USA star hotel”
Reviews.Author: moniquem03
Reviews.Content: rate hotel little toilet ran time resteraunt closed entire time main reasons selected hotel twin beds pushed flat mattress kept separating night staff speak english tried nice frustrating friendly sweet nonetheless please remember bring outlet reviews posted helpful views stunning clean bed washroom else phone using washcloths bring own tv italian channels tell english ones mtv english sometimes breakfast toast size crackers tea coffee club seltzer water remember water feature bus literally outside hotel runs 11 nights mean locally prepared bus resteraunts close sketchy hours hardly load drinks snacks grocery stores bus 32 finally catch le isle resteraunt spoke english menu italian needless french fries lol oh day serve meat check church bells door nice rome food please ready disappointed pizza american pizza food wine met friends nc hotel blessing day trip pompeii own cheaper committed stay tour pay 300 2 tour own taking 32 bus terminal train naples pompeii 100 24 2 paid 120 online oh atm wills money savings found hard hope helps god bless

Reviews.Title: “We had a really relaxing stay; just what we needed!”
Reviews.Author: Benjamin R
Reviews.Content: reviewer mentions hectic city life hes absolutely bangon hotel requires bit effort fairly removed centre rome worth effort isnt tourist sight village isola farnese charming hotel little gem staff merely polite delightful friendly cheerful suggestions day wandering wouldnt found guidebook woken middle night hooting owl awakened hear news time enjoy drift sleep

Reviews.Title: “Amazing”
Reviews.Author: Bryan W
Reviews.Content: amazing hotel stay owner spoke english helpful broken italian generous clean stained wood cabinets view gorgeous italian countryside main drag nice hectic city life provided scenery street gorgeous catholic church

Reviews.Title: “Went out of his way for us”
Reviews.Author: Tom H
Reviews.Content: hotel closed night owner willing night providing dinner breakfast gotten day walking biggest snow storm italy seen quarter century drove bad weather care cost 50 euro reasonable real godsend

Reviews.Title: “Not too busy, and just close enough”
Reviews.Author: Joseph119
Reviews.Content: hotel owner simone gracious provided service beyond normally expect service prompt polite staff spoke english excellent stay thats busyness rome easily accessible metro

Reviews.Title: “A Real Taste of Italy - Beautiful”
Reviews.Author: Christopher S
Reviews.Content: truly fantastic girlfriend little trip europe decided stay tempio di apollo due location outside city centre price truly fantastic allow hour termini station hotel worth travel follow instructions provided hotel stop bus top hill rewarded kindest staff truly spectacular views lovely free fast wifi extra treat morning served breakfast roof hotel overlooking beautiful scenery entire trip im didnt enjoy staying tempio di apollo real italy fantastic experience italian life
